wadl:application.wadl:doc: The Archival Storage function stores, maintains, and retrieves AIPs. It accepts AIPs submitted from the Ingest function, assigns them to long term storage, checks data integrity, and provides requested AIPs to the Access function

wadl:representation.wadl:doc:
Represents the information returned by the server when an error happens.

<_STATUS_ _SHORT-MESSAGE_

_MESSAGE_

wadl:param.name: Content-MD5
wadl:param.wadl:doc: AIP description checksum

wadl:param.name: Location
wadl:param.wadl:doc: URL to the job status

wadl:resource.wadl:doc: Handles AIPs within the Archival Storage component.

wadl:method.name: GET
wadl:method.wadl:doc: Lists AIPs from the Archival Storage component according to the project name. In addition, this resource allows to follow up the archive status of each AIP.

wadl:param.name: projectName
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Constraints the query on the the project name. A project name must be declared in the REGARDS instance.

wadl:param.name: startPage
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Page number of the result. The page number starts to 1.

wadl:param.name: itemsPerPage
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Number of items per page that returns the server.

wadl:param.name: filterByTagName
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Constains the query on a list of tag name. A tag name is a label that links an AIP to a collection.

wadl:param.name: filterByType
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Containts the query on AIP types. By default, the query is performed on all the AIP types

wadl:option.wadl:doc: AIP that describes the main file to preserve (e.g. scientific acquisition).
AIP that describes a collection of AIP.

wadl:param.name: filterByState
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Filters the session by processing state

wadl:option.wadl:doc: The storage of the AIP has been accepted for execution but is waiting in a queue.
The storage of the AIP is running.
The AIP is archived. This means that all AIP external files have been stored.
Some form of error has occured.
The storage of the AIP has been aborted, either by user request of by the server because of lack or overuse of ressources

The storage of the AIP has been suspended by the system during the execution. This might be because of temporary lack of resource. The job will be automatically resumed into the EXECUTNG phase without any intervention when ressource becomes available.

wadl:param.name: modificationDate
wadl:param.wadl:doc: Constaints the query on new AIP from the modification date.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token. Public has a different and an unlimited token for each project

wadl:response.wadl:doc: Returns the list of AIPs for a given project
One of the query parameters is wrong.
The user is not allowed to access to this service.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.

wadl:method.name: POST
wadl:method.wadl:doc: Stores an AIP and creates a new version when the identifier already exists. When the checksum of the submitted AIP is the same as an AIP already submitted, the storage of the AIP is refused.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token.

wadl:response.wadl:doc: The AIP representation is not valid. The problem may come when the IP_ID or a checksum related to a file are not set in the AIP description.
The user is not allowed to access to this service.
The submitted AIP is refused because it was already submitted with the same information.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.

wadl:param.name: Origin
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter is automatically added by the browser

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Request-Method
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter is automatically added by the browser

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Request-Headers
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support This parameter is automatically added by the browser

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter defines which host is able to make cross-domain queries.

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Allow-Credentials
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter allows to propagate cookies, client SSL certificate and authentication parameters.

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Expose-Headers
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter allows the client to read the headers from the server's response.

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Expose-Headers
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter allows the client to read the headers from the server's response.

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Max-Age
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter caches the CORS request by setting the result in cache. The time, during the information is cached, is expressed in seconds.

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter contains the verbs that the client is allowed to use.

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter contains the headers parameters that the client is allowed to use.

wadl:method.name: GET
wadl:method.wadl:doc: Retrives the AIP description and its archival status.

wadl:param.name: IP_ID
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The AIP identifier.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token.

wadl:response.wadl:doc: The user is not allowed to access to this service.
URI no longer exists. The AIP has been deleted. Only the trace of this URI is kept.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.

wadl:method.name: POST
wadl:method.wadl:doc: Creates an new revision of the AIP description. The revision is performed by the administrator According to the checksum of the AIP, the operation is allowed.

wadl:param.name: IP_ID
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The AIP identifier.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token.

wadl:response.wadl:doc: The AIP representation is not valid. The problem may come when the IP_ID or a checksum related to a file are not set in the AIP description.
The user is not allowed to access to this service.
The submitted AIP is refused because it was already submitted with the same information.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.

wadl:method.name: PUT
wadl:method.wadl:doc: Updates an AIP description without any revision. This update is performed by the administrator According to the checksum of each external URI regarding to those already stored, the operation is performed and the archived files are replaced by the external ones.

wadl:param.name: IP_ID
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The AIP identifier.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token.

wadl:response.wadl:doc: The AIP representation is not valid. The problem may come when the IP_ID or a checksum related to a file are not set in the AIP description.
The user is not allowed to access to this service.
The submitted AIP is refused because it was already submitted with the same information.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.

wadl:method.name: DELETE
wadl:method.wadl:doc: Deletes an AIP. Data referenced by AIP is deleted when there is no more AIP referencing these data. This action is performed by the administrator.

wadl:param.name: IP_ID
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The AIP identifier.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token.

wadl:response.wadl:doc: The user is not allowed to access to this service.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.

wadl:param.name: IP_ID
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The AIP identifier.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token.

wadl:response.wadl:doc: The user is not allowed to access to this service.
URI no longer exists. The AIP has been deleted. Only the trace of this URI is kept.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.

wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter caches the CORS request by setting the result in cache. The time, during the information is cached, is expressed in seconds.

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter contains the verbs that the client is allowed to use.

wadl:param.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
wadl:param.wadl:doc: CORS support. This parameter contains the headers parameters that the client is allowed to use.

wadl:method.name: GET
wadl:method.wadl:doc: Lists the AIPs related to this tagID.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token.

wadl:param.name: tagID
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The tag identifier.

wadl:response.wadl:doc: One of the query parameters is wrong.
The user is not allowed to access to this service.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.

wadl:method.name: POST
wadl:method.wadl:doc: Links AIPs to a tagID or a subset of tagID.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token.

wadl:param.name: projectName
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The list of AIPs separated by comma

wadl:response.wadl:doc: One of the query parameters is wrong.
The user is not allowed to access to this service.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.

wadl:method.name: DELETE
wadl:method.wadl:doc: Deletes a tag from all AIPs or a subset of AIPs.

wadl:param.name: Authorization
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The authorization token.

wadl:param.name: tagID
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The tag name

wadl:param.name: project
wadl:param.wadl:doc: The project name.

wadl:response.wadl:doc: One of the query parameters is wrong.
The user is not allowed to access to this service.
The service is unavailable because the server is overloaded or in maintenance.
The service is unavailable because the server uses a tierce server, which is overloaded or in maintenance.
